articles.author: NPR
articles.title: Ford CEO does the math on Trump's auto tariffs - NPR
articles.description: Americans are rushing to car dealerships as they worry about what President Trump's tariffs will do to car prices in the coming months. New vehicle sales have been increasing steadily this year, and they jumped in March, according to market research firm Cox …
articles.content:
Ford-150 pickup trucks are displayed for sale at a dealership on March 24, 2025 in Austin, Texas.
Brandon Bell/Getty Images
